full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/6/2023 China House TELEMONE BOSTON MASS HANCOCK 6-9836 L China House 146 BOYLSTON STREET BOSTON 16 MASSACHUSETTS 8 November 19 54 To Whom It May Concern: This is to advise that Henry Oi, 102 Norway Street, Boston, Mass. Social Security FOIA (b)(6) has been steadily employed at this restaurant since its inception, May 1946 - and is presently acting in capacity of assistant general manager. His salary consists of $280.00 monthly plus proceeds from profit sharing plan of company's net earnings. Mr. Oi is considered a key employee and permanency of position is assured. Sincerely, CHINA HOUSE, Inc. Jeremice Timmie Chin, Treas. Chin JC/ms
